title: Hearty potato soup
ingredients: ['450g Maris Piper potatoes, peeled', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '20g polyunsaturated margarine', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '850ml hot vegetable stock', '150ml milk', 'chopped chives, to serve']
